Definition.WordDefinition: Richards, MO (town, FIPS 61364) Location: 37.90983 N, 94.55718 W Population (1990): 106 (40 housing units) Area: 0.7 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 64778 Richards, TX Zip code(s): 77873
Richards n : English literary critic who collaborated with C. K. Ogden and contributed to the development of Basic English (1893-1979) [syn: {I. A. Richards}, {Ivor Armstrong Richards}]
